attributes.action: Olympic Legacy - VAT FREE health and fitness
attributes.additional_details: As part of the Olympic Legacy the Government should abolish VAT on all health and fitness products and services including: exercise classes, personal training, health clubs, gyms, leisure centres, and any activities,that will protect, preserve and enhance the well being physically, mentally and emotionally of those participating.  In short anything that is preventative healthcare, particularly in the areas of fat and weight loss.  The twin effect will be to massively reduce the burden on the over-stretched NHS resources.
